speaker: CEO [Sashidhar Jagdishan]
quote: FY '25, we would probably grow slower than the system. FY '26, we may be at or around the system growth rate. FY '27, we should be faster than the system growth rate.

speaker: CFO [Srinivasan Vaidyanathan]
quote: On an average basis, we have grown around 15% year-on-year. Retail branch continues to contribute around 80% to 85%, in fact, to be precise, 84% of the total deposits.

speaker: CEO [Sashidhar Jagdishan]
quote: The margins have been stable in the range that we have been talking about at 3.45% to 3.5%. It's printed at 3.46%.

speaker: CFO [Srinivasan Vaidyanathan]
quote: Fees at about INR8,000 crores, grew by about 17% year-on-year. Third-party products, the distribution products have been quite strong. It grew by almost 32% in this quarter.

speaker: CEO [Sashidhar Jagdishan]
quote: The gross NPA continues to be stable at about 1.4%. In fact, the gross slippages at 1.2% is better than what we had witnessed same time last year.

speaker: CFO [Srinivasan Vaidyanathan]
quote: The loans that are floating, our external benchmark is roughly about 69%, 70% or thereabouts which is similar to what last quarter or the previous quarter that we had mentioned.

speaker: CEO [Sashidhar Jagdishan]
quote: The 129 or whatever that you're seeing is probably a kind of a temporary phenomenon... At some point in time, I think it will normalize to the median levels at which we have operated.

speaker: CFO [Srinivasan Vaidyanathan]
quote: Adding every quarter, a little more than 2 million customer base coming in, shows that the credits do increase, and we are seeing robust increase in the credits.

speaker: CEO [Sashidhar Jagdishan]
quote: Last year, we grew 917 branches. Our objective has been to make those investments and branches now when the credit has been benign.

speaker: CFO [Srinivasan Vaidyanathan]
quote: The industry has grown anywhere between 10.5%, 11%. And we have grown more than that, gaining market share any time period, if you take a year, three years or five years, between 50 to 70 basis points a year.
